des: "This dip is different, delicious, light, and great served with raw veggies or crackers! Trust me on the anchovy paste."
ins: Stir together the cream cheese, mayonnaise, parsley, onion, anchovy paste, garlic powder, and pepper until creamy. Separate the egg white from the yolk; chop roughly. Stir the chopped egg white into the dip. Sprinkle the chopped yolk over the top. Chill to serve.
